name: GitHub MCP Server
description: Provides contextual repository guidance, standardized best practices, and code assistance for GitHub projects.

endpoints.name: Code Assistance
endpoints.description: Connects to GitHub for repository FAQ and best practice code examples.

prompts.name: Get Repository FAQ
prompts.description: Retrieve frequently asked questions for a GitHub repository.

prompts.name: Get Best Practice Code
prompts.description: Fetch standardized code examples from authoritative sources.
